Description: Glazed composition cosmetic aryballos in the form of a hedgehog with a human head before spout on back.
Bibliographic references: Webb 1978 / Archaic Greek Faience, Miniature scent bottles and related objects from East Greece, 650-500BC (no. 910)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2005-present, Swansea, Egypt Centre, LT Loan
